short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to interact with Gemini.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Gemini Chrome Extension is a powerful tool designed to provide quick and efficient responses directly within your browser. This extension seamlessly integrates with Chrome's native Gemini Nano model, allowing users to interact with AI for quick answers to simple questions. One of its standout features is the ability to access the Gemini Nano model offline, ensuring reliable and immediate assistance at any time. Enhance your browsing experience with the Gemini Chrome Extension, offering fast, on-demand AI support without needing an internet connection.

Usage: (You can visit https://github.com/TriangleSnake/TriGemini/blob/main/README.md for more detail)

To using this extension, you have to enable some settings in your Chrome browser

1. Visit chrome://flags and enable Enables optimization guide on device and Prompt API for Gemini Nano
notice: your Chrome version must be 127 or higher

2. Hit F12 to open your console and enter await window.ai.createTextSession()
It is normal that your console throwing an error, don't worry.

3. Visit chrome://components and download Optimization Guide On Device Model

4. Restart your Chrome and install the extension

5. Click the extension's icon or simply press ctrl (command) + shift + Y to chat with Gemini Nano
